front.title: Shared-Ring protection (MSRP) mechanism for ring topology

abstract.t: This document describes requirements, architecture and solutions for MPLS-TP Shared Ring Protection (MSRP) in a ring topology for point- to-point (P2P) services. The MSRP mechanism is described to meet the ring protection requirements as described in RFC 5654. This document defines the Ring Protection Switch (RPS) Protocol that is used to coordinate the protection behavior of the nodes on MPLS ring.
